      • resolveTransferTypeQuery

        protected TransferTypeQuery resolveTransferTypeQuery(ActionContext context)
        Description copied from class: BasePaymentAction
        Should be overridden to return a transfer type query. When null is returned, it is assumed that there will be no transfer types on the request. Otherwise, a query is executed and an error is generated if there is no returned transfer type
        Specified by:
        resolveTransferTypeQuery in class BasePaymentAction
